name: Nancy Drew®: Tomb of the Lost Queen
description: Unearth Sinister Secrets in an Ancient Egyptian Tomb!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: : 1.5GHz or greater Pentium 4 or equivalent class CPU Memory: 512 MB of RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX 9.0 compatible video card DirectX®: 16 bit DirectX compatible sound card Hard Drive: 3 GB or more hard drive space Sound: 9.0

reviews.review_text: A great puzzle-solving game!! I've been playing Nancy Drew since the very beginning, and this is just another spectacular entry in the series. Loved playing in the Egyptian setting!
